content.prompt: Which of the following is supported by the main idea of the passage?

choices.label: Demonstrators in Iran are unpredictable and unclear in their demands, which will lead them to be crushed by the government.
The Arab uprisings in 2011 were the catalyst for the protests in Iran.
The Iranian state could meet the demonstratorsâ€™ demands and end the uprisings but probably will not.
Students were the largest group of protesters in Iran, and their issues were resolved in 2011.
